Html: What is the status of 64-bit support in NAudio and WPF Sound Visualization Library? I am totally new to these libraries and I am considering using the latter in one of my projects (a 64-bit application). Thanks.
the latest NAudio in source control should work fine in 64 bit. I can't speak for the SVL, but I doubt it has any interop in it, so it is likely to work in 64 bit
